text: Ordered from here because the price was better than the one on Sashabaw, delivery time was really good because they were slow, food was good, except i ordered multiple flavors on the crust of my pizza, and there might have been one of the …More

text: The pizza was good. Store is following safety measures. Staff was friendly. Pizza was ready when promised.

text: Bit on the burnt side

name: Jeff Phillips
text: Did not call ahead but ordered upon arrival. Experience was good and the pizza was made to order. Cashier offered suggestions on combo options to lower the price and was very helpful. The only downside was the parking lot congestion. Lots of traffic in and out in a small area.

name: Christine haines
text: Good pizza. Fast delivery

text: Good pizzas, Love the flavored crust and since I dont get cheese on my pizza they let me substitute a different topping in its place.. :)

text: Orderd pizza for delivery,  after a hour and 20 minutes I called and asked about the order. The employee who answered the phone could barely form sentences,  and passed me off to a manager who could only say "it should be on the way" …More
